ValidationRule.description: Prevents saving an order when the related Soft Drink has a Status of Expired, or when the ordered Quantity exceeds the Soft Drink Quantity Left.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), OR( ISPICKVAL(Soft_Drink__r.Status__c, 'Expired'), Quantity__c > Soft_Drink__r.Quantity_Left__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This order cannot be saved. Either the selected Soft Drink is expired, or the quantity ordered exceeds the available stock.
